Title: MISSING: The Unsolved Case of Stacey Smart | dreading
Description:
Support the Family's search via gofundme - https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-find-stacey-smart
Join the facebook group to support the family - https://www.facebook.com/HelpFindStaceySmart/

WHERE IS STACEY SMART?
MISSING FROM LEWISTON, CA
Missing Since- 11/2/16
Eyes-Blue
Hair- Blonde
Height- 5'8"
Weight- 180 lbs

On 11/2/16, Stacey Smart was reported missing from Lewiston, Ca. Stacey has platinum Blonde hair with a pixy style haircut and likes to wear hats. Stacey has a tattoo of a red lotus bloom on her lower back. If you've seen her, know where she is, or have any information of her whereabouts, call the Trinity County Sheriffs Department 530-623-3740 or Nor-Cal Alliance For The Missing anonymous tipline at 530-378-4491.
$10,000 Reward by the Secret Witness Program for information in the missing persons case as it pertains to Stacey Smart. The reward will not be dispensed unless the information is credible, viable and leads to the location of Stacey Smart. If you have any information please contact Trinity County Secret Witness at 530-623-8138.

On line anonymous tip form-
http://www.nor-calallianceforthemissing.org/tips.html

Title: Viral: The Life and Legacy of Amanda Todd | dreading
Description:
Download the FREE Upside App at https://upside.app.link/DREADING to get
$5 or more cash back on your first purchase of $10 or more

The Amanda Todd Legacy is a non-profit society that focuses on awareness and the well-being of all individuals of all ages.  We have a strong focus on prevention and awareness related to bullying, cyberabuse and internet safety.  As well, resources and education encouraging positivity, mental health and wellness and how to stay safer online are shared on our website.
‚Äã
Campaigns of awareness and outreach to both young people and adults are of primary importance.  We have presented globally to public schools, colleges, universities,  community events, conferences with attendees in focus areas of which may include law enforcement, social work, psychology  and mental health with an overall goal on empowerment, safety and wellness.
